curl -X POST https://your-n8n-instance.com/webhook/lead-capture \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "name": "Test User",
    "email": "test@example.com",
    "phone": "+1-555-0000",
    "company": "Test Company",
    "message": "This is a test lead submission",
    "source": "webhook"
  }'
